channel.description: Recent content in Publication on Air-Sea Modeling Lab. Yonsei Univ.

item.title: New paper
item.description: The Southern Ocean leaving the footprints on the chlorophyll Phytoplankton in the ocean contains chlorophyll in their body which absorbs CO2 and emits O2 during photosynthesis. Thus the amount of chlorophyll plays an important role in air-sea CO2 flux.
